description: Number of n-bead bracelets (turn over necklaces) with 8 red beads.
comments: From Vladimir Shevelev, Apr 23 2011 (Start)Also number of non-equivalent necklaces of 8 beads each of them painted by one of n colors.The sequence solves the so-called Reis problem about convex k-gons in case k=8 (see our comment to A032279).(End)
